title: Louisiana Purchase was politically troubling - why

content.question: The Louisiana Purchase proved politically troubling for Thomas Jefferson because of his

choices.label: previous support for a strict interpretation of the Constitution
veto of funding for Meriwether Lewis and William Clark’s expedition
devotion to new methods of cartography
disdain for involvement in a foreign country’s affairs

content.answer: previous support for a strict interpretation of the Constitution

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
